name: First Time in Hawaii
description:
Say 'Aloha' to Hawaii!

Kate and Nicole Robinson hit up Hawaii for a very special occassion: the wedding of their good friend Stella!

Help Kate work her wedding magic!

Kate's got a date with with Hawaii! In this Hidden Object game with a tropical twist, see all the local sights, experience all the local favorites — and maybe even give your good friend Stella the best wedding ever!





Features!

  • Return to your favorite Hawaiian spots as much as you like in Unlimited Mode!
  • Unlock achievements by playing through the game!
  • Fun Facts about Hawaii

Collector's Edition

The collector's edition has over 30 different minigames, all full of tropical fun!


Also comes with downloadable wallpapers and the full soundtrack!


Experience the beauty of our handcrafted Hidden Object locations! Check out First Time In Hawaii!
